channel.title: Connecting to nested VPN before Gateway
channel.description:
Hello,
From docs it says :
VPN Installed on both the Host and Whonix-Gateway ™ User → Host's VPN → Gateway's VPN → Tor → Internet
I would not install second VPN inside Whonix gateway . Is there any alternative way to install second VPN outside Whonix gateway instead within KVM I plan to install additional Linux as VM to install Openvpn inside it ..Whonix gateway then should get internet access from it, like pfsense vpn client
Is this possible and how to achieve this

item.title: Connecting to nested VPN before Gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
merke:

Is there any alternative way to install second VPN outside Whonix gateway instead within KVM

Whonix – 26 Jan 22

Information Booster might be Available!

Utilizing other resources to help solve questions/issues unspecific to Whonix ™.

merke:

I plan to install additional Linux as VM to install Openvpn inside it …Whonix gateway then should get internet access from it, like pfsense vpn client

Possible in theory but undocumented in practice.

Whonix – 9 Jan 22

Undocumented, Untested or Unsupported Features

This feature is either undocumented, untested, or unsupported. Options: Become a Contributor / Apply Free Support Principle / Purchase Premium Support.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to nested VPN before Gateway

item.description:
Hello,

From docs it says :

VPN Installed on both the Host and Whonix-Gateway ™
User → Host’s VPN → Gateway’s VPN → Tor → Internet

I would not install second VPN inside Whonix gateway .
Is there any alternative way to install second VPN outside Whonix gateway instead within KVM
I plan to install additional Linux as VM to install Openvpn inside it …Whonix gateway then should get internet access from it, like pfsense vpn client

Is this possible and how to achieve this
